text: Pye Ester Agneta Engström (née Nanneson; born 8 June 1928) is a Swedish sculptor. She was born in Danderyd Municipality, Sweden. Engström studied at the Konstfack (1945-48), Royal Institute of Art (1945-48) and Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts (1948-53). She has been married to writer Clas Engström since 1951. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Sculptors Category:Swedish artists Category:21st-century artists Category:20th-century artists
title: Pye Engström
